title: Studio south loop
posting_body: ['Subletting or Reletting Studio', '1000 S Clark St, Chicago, IL 60605-2191, United States', '**LEASE GOES UNTIL MARCH 2023, no short term subleases** option to renew', 'Hi everyone!', 'I’m looking for sublease or re-let my studio apartment in the south loop.', 'Move in time is flexible and the lease currently goes until March 2023.', 'The building has full amenities, a huge gym and rooftop patio, pool, golf simulator, basketball & racketball courts,']
